PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-03292017-04-12,  ,  ISED,  , 
ActCanadian Tourism Commission Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Small Business and Tourism of MONIQUE GOMEL of Vancouver, British Columbia, to be a director of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Tourism Commission, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, in the place of Scott Allison, whose term has expired.
AttachmentsAttachment
